body.value:
We are still creating the demo as exporting Layouts is not yet supported by Default Content.

Developer Notes for Updating the Demo

Exporting

  1. Add drush to the local project with: "drush/drush": "^10"
  2. Default Content is already installed. Documentation is here.
  3. Make changes.
  4. Export configuration changes (content type, taxonomy) with drush cex.
  5. Move changes to layout_builder_kit_demo/config/install.
  6. Find the UUIDs for the nodes and add them to layout_builder_key_demo.info.yml.
  7. Export content changes with drush dcem layout_builder_kit_demo
  8. The content files are automatically added to layout_builder_kit_demo/node.
  9. Commit. Resetting

 

Resetting

  1. Delete the Book Description field in the Book content type at /admin/structure/types/manage/book/fields.
  2. Uninstall the demo module:
    drush pmu -y layout_builder_kit_demo
  3. Delete the existing nodes:
    drush entity-delete node --all
  4. Re-install Layout Builder Kit Demo:
    drush e -y layout_builder_kit_demo

OR

Recreate the test harness with: drush si standard --account-name=admin --account-pass=password --db-url=mysql://drupal8:drupal8@database/drupal8 --site-name="Layout Builder Kit Project" --no-interaction
